title: Key Fragment boost?
body: I have been going on several win sprees lately, and even though riot says that you are guaranteed a key fragment after several games, i have not gotten a single one in quite some time while a friend of mine is getting fragments every game he wins. I don't know if someone got into my account and messed something up without a trace, but I really don't want to buy RP just to unlock hextech boxes. Riot PLEASE increase the chances of a key fragment again.
